title: TROLLHUNTERS: RISE OF THE TITANS Ending Explained!
author: Think Story
comment:
Is this THE END of Trollhunters or do you think they'll continue the story? Let me know below.

Check out my other Ending Explained videos here: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLY9KJ1cFVs7gWaA4Gb4lNuE0ZWMtBw3kg

Fixing the ending:
Jim goes back in time only a few days before the Arcane order attack Doux and Nari, done, now he knows what will happen, and no one has to die
I love Toby, but this makes it feel like the amulet just chose the first best person it met to be the trollhunter, like, Jim wasen't anything special 😅
Am I the only one who prefers “For the glory of Merlin”

Anyone feel Steve and Eli were kind of wasted in this finale?  Like they did nothing except serve as comedic relief.  Toby does that and is still useful to the plot.  I felt like Steve's growth from Camelot was squandered in this film.  Secondly there was supposed to be this evacuation which never occurred or even looked like it was ready to use just in case.  Also felt the worlds reaction was not proportionate to the threat.  There is no way in hell 3 titans roam across America without the US at least nuking them at least once after conventional forces are used.
description:
In this video we take a look at Netflix and Dreamwork's latest film TROLLHUNTERS: RISE OF THE TITANS! Its ending and connection to the Trollhunters Saga, 3Below, and Wizards!
